videos.description: Jalen Suggs steals the ball and dishes a dime to Franz Wagner for the bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jalen Suggs makes beautiful dime for a basket) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Check out this beautiful dime from Jalen Suggs for a Magic's bucket

videos.description: Franz Wagner drives to the hole and throws it down for the Magic.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Franz Wagner elevates for jam vs. Detroit Pistons) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Franz Wagner elevates for the one-handed flush

videos.description: Cole Anthony drives to the basket and muscles past his defender to drain the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cole Anthony impresses with nice basket) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cole Anthony takes it coast-to-coast for the and-1 basket

videos.description: Wendell Carter Jr. drives to the basket and posterizes his defender to extend the Magic's lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Wendell Carter Jr. skies for big slam) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Wendell Carter Jr. raises the roof as he posterizes his defender

videos.description: Cole Anthony with the sweet no-look dish to Mo Bamba for the jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cole Anthony makes beautiful pass for a basket) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cole Anthony dimes Mo Bamba for the two-handed flush

videos.description: Terrence Ross launches it from deep and drains a 3-pointer for the Magic.
videos.headline: Terrence Ross shows off his range with this 3-pointer
